actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to extend certain tax provisions designed to encourage the preservation of historic structures.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend from June 15, 1981, to July 1, 1986, the termination date for certain provisions of the Tax Reform Act of 1976 relating to the allowance of a deduction for the amortization of certain rehabilitation expenditures for certified historic structures.

titles.title: A bill to extend certain tax provisions designed to encourage the preservation of historic structures.
